item.title: Certified Red Team Operator (CRTO) Review
item.description: What is CRTO? CRTO is supposed to be an introductory course into red teaming tradecraft, from initial compromise all the way to domain takeover and data exfiltration. From their website: “Red Team Ops is an online course that teaches the basic principals, tools and techniques, that are synonymous with red teaming. Students will first cover the core concepts of adversary simulation, command & control, and how to plan for an engagement.
